name: Take a minute
description:
QUATERNIONS TRIED TO MURDER MY BRAIN  This was created for the 3 hour game jam.  Since I'm just starting out it took me way longer to do something especially considering I didn't know rotation was supposed to break you.  I made it a "stop work and zone for a minute" type of game.  I did mean to leave the glitchy look of the game to make it more interesting. 

Move your mouse over to spin the cubes.  Reset to start over and hide the UI for the best experience.  After a minute there is a popup to remind you to go back to work.
